st: duniya se mile gam to bahut hai,
s:
duniya se mile gam to bahut hai,
inn mile gamo se aankhe num to bahut hai,
kab ke mar jaate inn ghamo ke sehkar,
par dosto ki duaaon mein asar bahut hai.

st: Dost kabhi dosto se khafa nahi hote,
s:
Dost kabhi dosto se khafa nahi hote,
mile dil kabhi juda nahi hote,
bhula dena mere kamiyo ko kyunki,
dost kabhi khuda nahi hote.

st: Safar dosti ka yuhi chalta rahe,
s:
Safar dosti ka yuhi chalta rahe,
Suraj chahe har sham ko dhalta rahe,
Na dhalegi apni dosti ki subha,
Chahe har rishta ab badalta rahe.

st: Ishq aur dosti meri jindagi ka guman hai,
s:
Ishq aur dosti meri jindagi ka guman hai,
Ishq meri rooh hai to dosti mera imaan hai,
Ishq pe kardu fida saari zindagi,
Magar dosti pe mera ishq kurban hai.

st: Zindagi Rahe Na Rahe hamari Dosti Rahegi,
s:
Zindagi Rahe Na Rahe hamari Dosti Rahegi,
Paas Rahe Na Rahe hamari Yaadein Rahegi,
Apni Zindagi Mein Hamesha Haste Rehna,
Kyunki Aapki Hasi Me Ek Muskaan hamari Rahegi.

st: Rishton mein Duriya to aati rehti hai,
s:
Rishton mein Duriya to aati rehti hai,
Dosti sada do Dilon ko milati rehti hai,
Wo Dosti hi kya Jisme Narazgi na ho,
Par Sachi Dosti hamesha Dosto ko Mana leti hai.

st: aapki hasi badhi pyari lagti hai,
s:
aapki hasi badhi pyari lagti hai,
aapki har khusi hamari lagti hai,
juda mat karna kabhi dil se hume,
kyuki jaan se bhi pyari aapki yaari lagti hai.

st: Karni Khuda se kuch fariyaad baaki hai,
s:
Karni Khuda se kuch fariyaad baaki hai,
Hame unse kehni kuch baat abhi baaki hai,
Maut aayegi to kehna ruk ja,
abhi apne Dost se Mulakaat baaki hai.

st: Najre milakar hamse najre chura mat lena,
s:
Najre milakar hamse najre chura mat lena,
Dost bnakar hamko dushman bana mat lena,
Mana ki hume dar hai aapki esi baat ka,
bahana banakar humko bhula mat dena.

st: Inn aankho se sapne churaya na karo,
s:
Inn aankho se sapne churaya na karo,
humari dosti ko kabhi azmaya na karo,
tumhari ek hasi meri dil ki dhadkan hai,
unhe yu na ansuo mein gavaya karo.

st: Dosti imtiehan nahi vishwas mangti hai,
s:
Dosti imtiehan nahi vishwas mangti hai,
nazar aur kuch nahi dost ka deedar mangti hai,
Zindagi apne liye kuch bhi nahi hai,
par dosto ke liye ye dua hazar mangti hai.

st: Har Pal Khushi Ka Ho Aapke Liye,
s:
Har Pal Khushi Ka Ho Aapke Liye,
Gulshan Ho ye Zindagi Aapke Liye,
har Manzil ho Kamyabi Ki Aapke Liye,
Par Dosti Ho Aapki sirf or sirf Hamaare Liye.

st: Mann Mein Aapki Har Baat Rahegi,
s:
Mann Mein Aapki Har Baat Rahegi,
Basti Chuti Hai Magar Aabad Rahegi,
Chahe Hum Bhula De Zamane Ko,
Magar Apki Ye Dosti Humesha Yaad Rahegi

st: Pyara se dost ko salaam hamara,
s:
Pyara se dost ko salaam hamara,
Aap kaise ho sawaal hamara,
Yaad karte rahenge ye hai wada hamara,
Filhaal kabool kijiye Good Morning hamara.

st: Meri dosti ke saare ehsaas le lo,
s:
Meri dosti ke saare ehsaas le lo,
Dil Se pyar ke saare jazbaat le lo,
Nhai chodenge saath tumhare,
Iss dosti ke chahe hazaron imtehan le lo.

st: Do pal ki zindagi yoon hi beet jayegi,
s:
Do pal ki zindagi yoon hi beet jayegi,
Kaali raat ke baad nayi subah aayegi,
Agar dosto ki yaad satayegi,
To kasam se apki yaad sabse pehle aayegi.

st: nafrat koi aap se kar nahi sakta,
s:
nafrat koi aap se kar nahi sakta,
aap ki dosti ka karz koi bhar nahi sakta,
dil ke sab se khareeb hai aapki dosti,
aap se pyara dost kabhi koi ho nahi sakta.

st: Alfaz ki shakal mein Ehsaas likha jata hai,
s:
Alfaz ki shakal mein Ehsaas likha jata hai,
Yaani pani ko bhi pyaas likha jaata hai,
Mere jazbaat se waqif hai, meri kalam,
Main dost likhu to apka naam likha jata hai.

st: Dosti main dooriyan to aati rehti hai,
s:
Dosti main dooriyan to aati rehti hai,
Phir bhi dosti dilo ko mila deti hai,
Wo dosti hi kya jo naraz na ho,
Par sachi dosti to dosto ko mana leti hai.

st: Dost Ki Yaad har Waqt Hi Satayegi,
s:
Dost Ki Yaad har Waqt Hi Satayegi,
Dukh Ke Waqt Dosti Yaad Aayegi,
Uss Din Janoge Dost Ki Qadar,
Jis Din Dost Se Zindagi Ruth Jayegi.

st: Akhan di benuri changi nahin hundi,
s:
Akhan di benuri changi nahin hundi,
Dostan ton duri changi nahin hundi,
Kade kade milya vi kar yaara,
Har vele SMS naal gal puri nahin hundi.

st: Dosti sachi ho to waqt ruk jata hai,
s:
Dosti sachi ho to waqt ruk jata hai,
Aasman lakh ucha ho magar jhuk jata hai,
Dosti mein duniya laakh bane rukawat,
Agar dosti sachi ho to khuda bhi jhuk jata hai.

st: Aapki apni Dosti ka salam likhenge,
s:
Aapki apni Dosti ka salam likhenge,
Dil ki kitab mein apna armaan likhenge,
kash hume mil jaye asmaan ki huqumat,
sitaron ki jagah hum aap ka naam likhenge.

st: Saanso se pyari yaade hai tumhari,
s:
Saanso se pyari yaade hai tumhari,
Dhadkan se pyari baate hai tumhari,
Tumhe yakeen ho ya na ho,
Iss zindagi se pyari dosti hai hamari.

st: andhere ka ehsaas shaam se hota hai,
s:
andhere ka ehsaas shaam se hota hai,
Nashe ka ehsaas jaam se hota hai,
Yoon to bahut Dost hai duniya mein,
par Dosti ka ehsaas aapke naam se hota hai.

st: Yaad karoge toh har baat yaad aayegi‚
s:
Yaad karoge toh har baat yaad aayegi‚
Suhane waqt ki mauj ruk jayegi‚
Dhoodoge agar hamse behtar dost koi‚
Nigah door tak jayegi aur laut aayegi.

st: Taqdeer ne chaha taqdeer ne bataya,
s:
Taqdeer ne chaha taqdeer ne bataya,
Taqdeer ne tumko or humko milaya,
Khushnaseeb the wo pal ya hum,
Jab aap jaisa anmol dost iss zindagi me aaya.

st: Kahi unkahi baato ki ada hai dosti,
s:
Kahi unkahi baato ki ada hai dosti,
Har ranj-o-gham ki dawa hai dosti.
Zameen par kami hai pujne walo ki,
Warna is zameen par khuda hai dosti.

st: Hasrato Ki Nighon Pe Sakht Pehra Hai,
s:
Hasrato Ki Nighon Pe Sakht Pehra Hai,
Na-jaane Kis Umeed Par Dil Thehra Hai,
Teri Chahton Ki Kasam Aye Dost,
Apni Dosti Ka Rishta To Pyaar Se Bhi Gehra Hai.

st: Kuch Ehsaaon Ke Saaye Dil Ko Chu Jaate Hai,
s:
Kuch Ehsaaon Ke Saaye Dil Ko Chu Jaate Hai,
Kuch Manzar Dil Mein Utar Jaate Hai,
Be-jaan Gulshan Mein Bhi Phool Khil Jaate Hai,
Jab Zindagi Mein Aap Jaise Dost Mil Jaate Hai.

st: Lamhe Ye Suhane Sath Ho Na Ho,
s:
Lamhe Ye Suhane Sath Ho Na Ho,
Kal Mein Aaj Jaisi Koi Baat Ho Na Ho,
Aapki Dosti Hamesa Is Dil Mein Rahegi,
Chahe Puri Umar Mulaqat Ho Na Ho.

st: Teri dosti ne bohat kuch sikhla diya,
s:
Teri dosti ne bohat kuch sikhla diya,
Meri khamosh duniya ko jaise hasa diya,
Karzdaar hoon main khuda ka,
Jiss ne mujhe aap jaise dost se mila diya.

st: Dosti ki mehak ishq se kam nahi hoti,
s:
Dosti ki mehak ishq se kam nahi hoti,
Ishq pe hi zindagi khatm nahi hoti,
Agar sath ho zindagi mein acche dosto ka,
to Zindagi kisi mehkhane se kam nahi hoti.

st: Khuda Ki Banayi kudrat Nahi Dekhi,
s:
Khuda Ki Banayi kudrat Nahi Dekhi,
Dilon Main Chupi Daulat Nahi Dekhi,
Jo Kehta Hai Doori Se Mit Jati Hai Dosti,
Usne Shayad Hamari Dosti Nahi Dekhi.

st: Dosti wo ehsaas hai jo mit nahi sakta,
s:
Dosti wo ehsaas hai jo mit nahi sakta,
Dosti wo parwat hai jo jhook nahi sakta,
Iski keemat kya hai ye mujhse pucho,
Ye wo anmol moti hai jo bikta nahi sakta.

st: Kehte Hain Har Baat Sab Ko Batai Nahi Jaati,
s:
Kehte Hain Har Baat Sab Ko Batai Nahi Jaati,
Apno Ko Bhi kuch baate Sunayi Nahi Jaati,
Par Dost Tum Mere Dil Ka Aaina Ho,
Aur Aaine Se to Koi Baat Chupayi Nahi Jaati.

st: Raaston se kankar hata nahi sakte,
s:
Raaston se kankar hata nahi sakte,
apni pehchaan khud ko bata nahi sakte,
Zindagi ki raah mein bane the hamsafar,
kyon wo ye dosti ab nibha nahi sakte.

st: Bahut khubsurat hai yeh sath tumhara,
s:
Bahut khubsurat hai yeh sath tumhara,
bana dijiye ab isse kismat hamari,
usse aur kya chahiye duniya main,
mil gayi ho jisse pyari si dosti tumhari.

st: Hamari aapki dosti bilkul fix hai,
s:
Hamari aapki dosti bilkul fix hai,
Love, emotion, sadness sab kuch mix hai,
Hum to aapko na bhulayenge kabhi,
Aap bhool na jao bus iska risk hai.

st: Aye Mere sms Mere Dost ke Pass jana,
s:
Aye Mere sms Mere Dost ke Pass jana,
Wo Busy ho to Shor mat machana,
Jab Wo Free ho jaaye to Dheere se Muskruna,
Aur Pyar se kehna ki, Eid Mubarak Qubool Ho dost.

st: Har zindagi ko ek kinara chahye,
s:
Har zindagi ko ek kinara chahye,
Har insan ko ek sahara chahye,
Zindagi kat sake haste-haste is liye,
Yaar aap jaisa ek pyara chahye.

st: Tu nahi raha to zindagi mein kya reh jayega,
s:
Tu nahi raha to zindagi mein kya reh jayega,
zindagi mein tanhai ka silsila aam ho jayega,
Har kadam par sath chalna aye mere dost,
warna aapka ye dost tanha hi reh jayega.

st: Dosto ke bina zindagi veeran hoti hai,
s:
Dosto ke bina zindagi veeran hoti hai,
Akele sabhi raah sunsaan hoti hai,
Ek saccha dost ka hona bhi zaruri hai,
Kyuki dost se hi har muskil aasan hoti hai.

st: Har kadam pe imtihan leti hai zindagi,
s:
Har kadam pe imtihan leti hai zindagi,
Har waqt naye sadme deti hai zindagi,
Par hum zindgi se sikwa kaise kare,
Ki tumsa dost bhi to deti hai zindagi.

st: Zindagi lehar thi aap sahil hue,
s:
Zindagi lehar thi aap sahil hue,
Na jaane kaise hum aapki dosti ke qabil hue,
Na bhulenge hum uss haseen pal ko,
Jab aap hamari choti si zindagi mein shamil hue.

st: Hontho Se Pyaar Ke Fasaane Nahi Aate,
s:
Hontho Se Pyaar Ke Fasaane Nahi Aate,
Sahil Pe Samundar Ke Moti Nahi Aate,
Lelo Abhi Zindagi Mein Dosti Ka Maza,
Phir Laut Ke Hum Jaise Dost Nahi Aate.

st: Baharon ki mehfil suhani rahegi,
s:
Baharon ki mehfil suhani rahegi,
Labon pe khushi ki kahani rahegi,
Chamkate rahenge khushiyon ke sitare,
Agar aap ki dosti ki meharbani rahegi.

st: Phoolon ki waadi mein ho basera tera,
s:
Phoolon ki waadi mein ho basera tera,
Sitaro ke aangan mein ho ek ghar tera,
Dua hai ek Dost ki ek Dost ke liye,
Ki mujhse bhi khoobsurat naseeb ho tera.

st: Muskarana hi to khushi nahi hoti,
s:
Muskarana hi to khushi nahi hoti,
umar bitana hi to zindagi nahi hoti,
dost ko roj yaad karna padta hai kyunki,
bas  dost kehna hi to dosti nahi hoti.

st: rishton ki kitaab ka cover hai dosti,
s:
rishton ki kitaab ka cover hai dosti,
dosti se bani hai hamari hasti,
khoon ke rishton ki baat aap karte hai,
hamare liye to zindagi hai aap ki dosti.

st: Ehsaan dosto pe kabhi jatane nahi hote,
s:
Ehsaan dosto pe kabhi jatane nahi hote,
liye hai jo karz dosti mein chukane nahi hote,
bas salamat rahe yuhi ye pyari si dosti hamari,
ye wo riste hai jo kabhi anjane mein nahi hote.

st: Dil Ke Sabhi Halaat Mujhe Keh lene Do,
s:
Dil Ke Sabhi Halaat Mujhe Keh lene Do,
Behte Hai Ashq To Inhe Behne Do,
Bewafai Shamil Na Karo Dosti Ki Raho Mein,
Kam Se Kam Dosti Ko To Dosti hi Rehne Do.

st: Har Koi Pyaar Ke Liye Tadapta Hai,
s:
Har Koi Pyaar Ke Liye Tadapta Hai,
Har Koi Pyaar Ke Liye Rota Hai,
Aye Dost Ye Dosti Sada Kayam Rakhna,
Kyunki Sabse zyada Pyaar Iss Dosti Mein Hi Hota Hai.

st: Door Ho Jaun To Zara Intezaar Karna,
s:
Door Ho Jaun To Zara Intezaar Karna,
Apne Dil Ko Na Yoon Bekarar Karna,
Laut Kar Aayenge Hum chahe Jaha Bhi ho,
Bas Humari Dosti Par dil se Aitbaar Karna.

st: Kuch Meethe Pal Yaad Aate Hai,
s:
Kuch Meethe Pal Yaad Aate Hai,
Palko Par Aansu Chod Jaate Hai,
Kal Koi Mile To Hume Na Bhool Jana,
Dosti Ke Rishte Zindagi Bhar Kaam Aate Hai.
